name: React Course
description: React - The complete guide (incl Hooks, React, Router, Redux) This course takes a hands-on approach to create applications and deploy them. This allows students to learn real problems and design projects to deal with them. The course covers topics such as: Learning to build powerful reactive web apps.

name: Redux Course
description: Redux is the most commonly used state-management library with React. Redux lets you use plain JavaScript syntax, but enforces consistent patterns that make your apps reliable and predictable.

name: Node js and React
description: Node. js enables the creation of scalable and quick back-end RESTful APIs. On the other hand, React is a front-end library that creates interactive user interfaces.

name: Mern Stack
description: The course is divided into four sections, each targeting a specific technology(s). It has an excellent rating of 4.7. Not only it covers React, MongoDB, Node, and Express for web development, it also has a course for creating cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Java Spring
description: A Java Springboot developer develops web applications and microservices with Spring Framework. A Java backend developer uses Spring Framework to create the server-side code of web applications.

name: Learn Python
description: Python is a popular general-purpose programming language. It is used in machine learning, web development, desktop applications, and many other fields. Fortunately for beginners, Python has a simple, easy-to-use syntax.
